title: Metabolic Support
cleaned_text: Description Metabolic Support supports normal homocysteine levels, thereby supporting overall cardiovascular wellness, including normal blood pressure, blood sugar and cholesterol levels.* Metabolic Support Also Supports: ingredients: Berberine Berberine is a plant alkaloid that has been used for thousands of years in traditional Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine to provide antioxidant activity, immune system support and proper microbial balance.* Its relationship to cardiovascular support has been of high importance in recent years due to its ability to support normal homocysteine levels and cholesterol within normal ranges.* Supplement Facts Serving Size: 1 Capsule Amount Per Serving: Folate (as [6S]-5-methyltetrahydrofolic acid from 400 mcg of glucosamine Phosphatidylcholine Lipoic Acid 25 mg Other hypromellose (capsule), microcrystalline cellulose, vegetarian leucine. Contains: Soy. Warning: Do not take this product if pregnant or nursing. Suggested Use: As a dietary supplement, take 1 capsule, twice daily with food, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Disclaimer, Policies, Shipping Shipping Policy Most products ship within 2-3 business days of order receipt. Certain items ship within 7-10 business days. We reserve the right to consolidate shipments when the cart contains products from each fulfillment period. Return Policy We strive to provide products that will help you live a healthy life and our intent is to make you happy. Specialty Items are final sale and may not be returned. - 30 day money back on unopened products. Disclaimer The content of this website is based upon the opinion of Dr. Ellie Wright. The information on this website is not intended as medical advise nor to replace a one-on-one relationship with a qualified health care professional. Dr. Wright encourages you to make your own health care decisions based upon our research and to seek a qualified health care professional to help you. If you have a medical condition, if you are taking medications or if you are pregnant or nursing consult your health care professional before using products from this website. This website is intended to share information and knowledge obtained by Dr. Ellie Wright. FDA COMPLIANCE The information on this website has not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration or any other medical body. We do not aim to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness or disease. Information is shared for educational purposes only. You must consult your doctor before acting on any content on this website, especially if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication or have a medical condition.
